mapper.update:
UPDATE so_thirdparty
so_child_id = #{soChildId},
thirdparty_id = #{thirdpartyId},
thirdparty_status = #{thirdpartyStatus},
user_name = #{userName},
id_card_num = #{idCardNum},
phone = #{phone},
oid_card_num = #{oidCardNum},
comment = #{comment},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
so_child_code = #{soChildCode},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE so_thirdparty
so_child_id = #{po.soChildId},
thirdparty_id = #{po.thirdpartyId},
thirdparty_status = #{po.thirdpartyStatus},
user_name = #{po.userName},
id_card_num = #{po.idCardNum},
phone = #{po.phone},
oid_card_num = #{po.oidCardNum},
comment = #{po.comment},
create_time = #{po.createTime},
update_time = #{po.updateTime},
thirdparty_pay_amount = #{po.thirdpartyPayAmount},
thirdparty_pay_time = #{po.thirdpartyPayTime},
WHERE so_child_code = #{po.soChildCode}

UPDATE so_thirdparty
so_child_id = #{po.soChildId},
thirdparty_id = #{po.thirdpartyId},
thirdparty_status = #{po.thirdpartyStatus},
user_name = #{po.userName},
id_card_num = #{po.idCardNum},
phone = #{po.phone},
oid_card_num = #{po.oidCardNum},

update_time = #{po.updateTime},
WHERE thirdparty_id = #{po.thirdpartyId}
